LanguageData.IncredibleSnowstorm.label: Incredible snowstorm
LanguageData.IncredibleSnowstorm.description: Wind and snow batter the land, treading through it is very difficult. It is almost impossible to shoot anything in this storm.
LanguageData.HardFog.label: Heavy fog
LanguageData.HardFog.description: Fog mixed with heavy gases covered the region. Try not to breathe in too much.
LanguageData.Sandstorm.label: Sand storm
LanguageData.Sandstorm.description: Rough sand blows through the air, blinding anyone caught outside.
